DataManager

Contains logic for the Data Manager/Storage part of the numeric solver component

Functions
CreateDataTable
call DataManager.CreateDataTable(
columnCount,
rowCount,
&tableID
);

Create a table to hold values for use by solver, with the specified number of rows and columns

Parameters
columnCount

the number of columns in the created table

rowCount

the number of rows in the created table

Response Parameters
&tableID

the ID of the newly-created data table

DeleteTable
call DataManager.DeleteTable(
tableID,
&result
);

Delete the table with the specified ID

Parameters
tableID

the ID of the table to delete

Response Parameters
&result

the result of the delete operation

InsertData
call DataManager.InsertData(
tableID,
column,
row,
value,
&result
);

Insert the specified value into the given table's row and column

Parameters
tableID

the table where the data should be inserted

column

the column index

row

the row index

value

the value to insert

Response Parameters
&result

the result of the insert operation

GetData
call DataManager.GetData(
tableID,
column,
row,
&value,
&result
);

Get the specified value at the given table's row and column

Parameters
tableID

the table where the data should be inserted

column

the column index

row

the row index

Response Parameters
&value

the value at the given location

&result

the result of the get operation
